questions.questionText: Ashley needs to create a project for her resume to show to companies in about a month but doesn't know what to make, she was considering making a game or a quiz application or maybe even an AI, what do you think is best for her?
questions.correctAnswer: How about creating your own personal website that has your resume in it. That would be one of the best ways to give the company a look at your coding skills and it shouldn't take too long
options: A game sounds like a great way to get companies interested in you!
A quiz application sounds fun and it could show companies your ability
AI sounds amazing for her resume, she should definitely go with that!
How about creating your own personal website that has your resume in it. That would be one of the best ways to give the company a look at your coding skills and it shouldn't take too long
questions.response: Most of the options seem like it will take a while or aren't the best options in general, a website seems like the most relevant and best long term investment for Ashley

questions.questionText: Is Java a popular programming language?
questions.response: Java is one of the most popular languages in the world

questions.questionText: What is one of the oldest Programming Languages
Java is not an object oriented language
questions.response: Java uses objects which can have multiple classes in them and be called back

questions.questionText: For loops and Recursions are the same thing
questions.response: For loops keep repeating themselves until an integer is reached, recursions call themsevles back repeatedly

questions.questionText: Python is one of the most popular languages
JavaScript is a front end development language
questions.response: How do you think these questions and responses keep coming up

questions.questionText: Java is a front end development language
questions.response: It is used for back end development

questions.questionText: HTML is also a front end development language
questions.response: It was also used along with JavaScript to setup this quiz :P

questions.questionText: For loops are easily rewritten as while loops
questions.response: For loops are interchangeable with while loops

questions.questionText: While loops are easily rewritten as For loops
questions.response: While loops are not as easily interchangeable with while loops in most languages

questions.questionText: int sum(int n){ if(n==0)return 0; else return n+sum(n-1);    What is the runtime complexity of this statement?
questions.response: There are no recursions or anything of the sort and the algorithim runs at a solid O(n)
